source code 

Create a listener for LBaaS

Parameters:
  • name (str) - Listener name
  • description (str) - Description
  • protocol (str) - Protocol ('TCP', 'UDP', 'HTTP' or 'HTTPS')
  • protocol_port (int) - Protocol port number
  • connection_limit (int) - Maximun connection number
  • default_tls_container_ref (str) - A reference to a container of TLS secrets
  • sni_container_refs (str) - A list of references to TLS secrets
  • project (yakumo.project.Resource) - Project
  • is_enabled (bool) - Whether the listner is enabled
Returns: yakumo.neutron.v2.lbaas.listener.Resource
Created listener
Overrides: base.Manager.create
